certificate_name: Veterinary health certificate for hatching eggs other than of ratites intended for dispatch to the Republic of Turkey

pages.title: What are the details of the eggs?

content.header: What are the details of the eggs?

fields.label: Description
fields.hint: For example, hatching eggs in lots of 20 or more units:
fields.name: egg_description

pages.title: Where do the birds or eggs come from?

content.header: Where do the birds or eggs come from?
content.paragraph: The farm and hatchery need to be members of the poultry health scheme (PHS).

fields.label: Region of origin
fields.hint: Enter the country where the flocks are located
fields.name: product_species

pages.title: What are the details of the consignment?

content.header: What are the details of the consignment?

fields.label: Name, address and approval number of processing establishment
fields.name: processing_raw_milk
fields.default: ABC limited, France SA, Paris 039432. Registration number - FR3945-2342

fields.label: Name, address and approval number of processing establishment
fields.name: processing_export_product

pages.title: Where will the consignment be loaded?

content.header: Where will the consignment be loaded?

fields.label: Description of the product
fields.hint: Include details such as commodity type and product name
fields.name: product_details
fields.default: Coffee flat white, Coffee skinny capp,Coffee creamy

pages.title: When will the consignment be transported?

content.header: When will the consignment be transported?

fields.label: Identification marks
fields.hint: Enter the serial and batch numbers. Multiple numbers can be comma separated.
fields.name: consignment_id_marks

pages.title: How will the consignment be transported?

content.header: How will the consignment be transported?
content.paragraph: If you are the exporter, provide your name or business name. If you are an agent representing someone else, provide their name or business name.

pages.title: Where will the consignment arrive in Turkey?

content.header: Where will the consignment arrive in Turkey?

fields.label: Means of transportation
fields.hint: Enter the method of travel and the identification of the transport. For example Airplane ZZ1234
fields.name: transport_means

fields.label: Shipping marks
fields.hint: Enter the container and seal numbers
fields.name: transport_seal_number

fields.label: Name and address of consignee
fields.hint: Provide details of the person the consignment will be shipped to, or their representative.
fields.name: consignee_details
fields.default: ABC limited Australia, 637 Rowley Street, Melbourne, CIC2002

fields.label: Name and contact number of consignee representative
fields.hint: Leave blank if no agent has been used
fields.name: consignee_representive

pages.title: In which region will the certification take place?

content.header: In which region will the certification take place?

fields.label: Certification region
fields.hint: Select the region in which the certification will take place:
fields.name: certification_place

content.paragraph: If you are the exporter, provide your name or business name. If you are an agent representing someone else, provide their name or business name.

pages.title: What is the hatchery and flock of origin?

content.header: What is the hatchery and flock of origin?
content.paragraph: If your consignment is sourced from more than hatchery or flock, you can upload a schedule at the end of this application.

fields.label: Poultry Health Scheme number of hatchery
fields.name: phs_hatchery_number

fields.label: Poultry Health Scheme number of flock of origin
fields.name: phs_flock_number

pages.title: What is the planned date of export?

content.header: What is the planned date of export?
content.paragraph: This is the date that the consignment leaves the loading premises  This may not the same date that it leaves the UK.  For block applications, enter the estimated date that the first export is likely to take place.
